page.title: 04Clapham House Litlington
page.content: This 18th century house stands in 24 acres surrounded by a wall.There are well stocked vegetable,herb and fruit gardens.A cookery school is being run there by a French family with a French curriculum but in the English language.There is a limited capacity for boarding and day students.The full course of study entailing 2 terms of 10 weeks and 5 months training in well known hotels and restaurants gives the Diplome Superieur- a Cordon Bleu qualification.The curriculum aims to equip students with the principles and practice of French cooking,service and restaurant management.Short summer courses are also available.
